original_title: La Roque d'Anthéron - Les pianos de la nuit: Vanessa Wagner
overview: "Les Pianos De La Nuit" is a collection of piano recitals performed live in the heart of Provence during the International Piano Festival of La Roque D'Antheron in July and August 2002. Conceived specifically for DVD release, these virtuoso performances by contemporary artists can claim authoritative status as classic 21st-century archival footage.  Johannes Brahms (1833-1897)  4 Ballades, Op. 10  No. 1 in D minor "Edward"  No. 2 in D major  No. 3 in B minor "Intermezzo"  No. 4 in B major  Robert Schumann (1810-1856)  Piano Sonata No. 1 in F sharp minor, Op. 11  I Introduzione. Un poco adagio - Allegro vivace  II Aria  III Scherzo e Intermezzo. Allegrissimo - Lento  IV Finale. Allegro un poco maestoso
title: La Roque d'Anthéron - The Pianos of the Night: Vanessa Wagner
